name: Chronoblade (itch)
description:
Chronoblade is a fast paced killing oriented game focused on time. The player has to evade the enemies’ attack to efficiently defeat them. The Player's objective is to defeat all enemies in a space before their time runs out. Mind that activating bullet time and hit by enemies would also drains the time.

Hotkey not in in game tutorial: [R] to quick restart a level (to save time).
